meanings.definition: The act of celebrating Mass jointly by two or more priests.
meanings.sent1: During the concelebrations, the priests stood together at the altar.
meanings.sent2: The concelebrations at the church were a beautiful display of unity.
meanings.sent3: The concelebrations turned into a joyful gathering of clergy.
meanings.sent4: The concelebrations were a harmonious symphony of faith.
meanings.sent5: The concelebrations left a lasting impression on the congregation.

meanings.definition: A joint celebration or ceremony, especially among religious leaders.
meanings.sent1: The concelebrations brought together leaders from different faiths.
meanings.sent2: The annual interfaith concelebrations were a symbol of peace.
meanings.sent3: The concelebrations became a festive occasion for all attendees.
meanings.sent4: The concelebrations were a powerful demonstration of solidarity.
meanings.sent5: The concelebrations created a sense of community among the participants.
